question: The animals listed in which of the following schedules of Wildlife Protection Act have absolute protection?
option2: Schedule 3 and part II of Schedule 2
option3: Schedule 1 and part II of Schedule 2
answer: Schedule 1 and part II of Schedule 2
explanation: The animals listed in Schedule 1 and part II of Schedule 2 Â of Wildlife Protection Act have absolute protection. Offences under these schedules are prescribed the highest penalties. It was enacted on (9th September, 1972.
